data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 376,149 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kericho, Kenya
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Kericho, Kenya that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Kericho that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Kericho. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Somali people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Somali people know you.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Kericho, Kenya.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 382,152 people in Kericho who are far from you. Please add 151 new house churches this year.
Spirit, encourage the church of Kericho, Kenya that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

location.name: Kericho
location.people_groups_list: Gujarati Creole, Orma, Punjabi, Kachchi, Arab, Hadrami
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gujarati Creole (2,100), Orma (85,000), Punjabi (67,000), Kachchi (80,000), Arab, Hadrami (13,000)
